Plants

Generative Drawing - Some code

Advancded feature use at own risk

What is this thing?

The plant game is a little bit of code that draws pictures of "plants"

How do I play the plant game ?

Its easy just drag one plant onto another one and they will "breed" their "children" will have some characteristics of both parents.

The screen is divided up into two parts parents and children, the parents are not replaced when you breed the children will be overwritten every time you breed.

Who would make this weird thing ?
